Description:
Detects PowerShell scripts to set the ACL to a file in the Windows folder

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Set-Acl On Windows Folder - PsScript
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((scriptblocktext like '%set-acl %' and scriptblocktext like '%-aclobject %') and (scriptblocktext like '%-path "c:\windows%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path "c:/windows%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path 'c:\windows%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path 'c:/windows%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path c:\\windows%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path c:/windows%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path $env:windir%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path "$env:windir%' or scriptblocktext like '%-path '$env:windir%') and (scriptblocktext like '%fullcontrol%' or scriptblocktext like '%allow%'))
